TermDesc: Casting any form of Resonance Skill Aureole of Execution grants 1 stacks of Endnotes on the Endgame, which increases the DMG Multiplier of Resonance Liberation Rewritten in Winter's Margins by 20%, stacking up to 3 times. Casting Resonance Liberation Rewritten in Winter's Margins or switching to another Resonator removes all stacks.
